typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string,
	OriginalBlobName as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ForecastStagingTable
ForecastStagingTable derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_delete_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		Converted_Period_Date = toDate(Period_Date,'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		Status = 'non Tigermoth item',
		Product = 'non Tigermoth item',
		Current_Amount = toDecimal(0),
		Future_Amount = toDecimal(0)) ~> AddAuditColumnsandDate
AddAuditColumnsandDate alterRow(insertIf(record_delete_flag==0)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		CPM_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Period_Date','Fund_ID','Asset_ID','CPM_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date = Converted_Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Perpetual_Amount = Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag = record_delete_flag,
		process_name,
		CPM_Code,
		Status,
		Product,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
